text: uṅkaḷukku vāṉattiliruntum, pūmiyiliruntum uṇavaḷippavaṉ yār? (Uṅkaḷ) cevippulaṉ mītum, (uṅkaḷ) pārvaikaḷiṉ mītum caktiyuṭaiyavaṉ yār? Iṟantavaṟṟiliruntu uyiruḷḷavaṟṟaiyum, uyiruḷḷavaṟṟiliruntu iṟantavaṟṟaiyum veḷippaṭuttupavaṉ yār? (Akilaṅkaḷiṉ amaittuk) kāriyaṅkaḷaiyum tiṭṭamiṭṭuc ceyalpaṭuttupavaṉ yār?" Eṉṟu(napiyē!) Nīr kēḷum. Uṭaṉē avarkaḷ"allāh" eṉa patilaḷippārkaḷ; "avvāṟāyiṉ avaṉiṭam nīṅkaḷ payapaktiyuṭaṉ irukka vēṇṭāmā?" Eṉṟu nīr kēṭpīrāka
